events.message: I have been involved in a car collision yesterday evening, and I need to file a claim for the damages sustained to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details submitted regarding the vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to assist you throughout the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by our system and is now being processed.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, a police report, and your driverâ€™s license to continue with the claim.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle damage photos, have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has begun, focusing on verifying the collision circumstances.
The investigation has been completed and all findings regarding the vehicle collision have been documented.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment of damages and repair estimates for your vehicle.
We have received your feedback regarding the settlement offer and are reviewing your concerns accordingly.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and the settlement amount finalized for payment.
The payment for your approved claim has been issued to your bank account as per the agreed settlement.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed in our system following the successful payment.
